quotes.quote: All is for the best in the best of all possible ways.
All joy... emphasizes our pilgrim status; always reminds, beckons, awakens desire. Our best havings are wantings.
The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
We are not necessarily doubting that God will do the best for us; we are wondering how painful the best will turn out to be.
The fox has many tricks. The hedgehog has but one. But that is the best of all.
Whether it's the best of times or the worst of times, it's the only time we've got.
Only the mediocre are always at their best.
Far and away the best prize that life offers is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.
The best things in life are often waiting for you at the exit ramp of your comfort zone.
The best revenge is to be unlike the one who performed the injustice.
The best thing one can do when it's raining is to let it rain.
To help yourself, you must be yourself. Be the best that you can be. When you make a mistake, learn from it, pick yourself up and move on.
Good or bad, everything we do is our best choice at that moment.

If you want to be the best, you can't take the path of least resistance. Every morning, you wake up, and your mind tells you it's too early, and your body tells you you're a little too sore, but you've got to look deep within yourself and know what you want and what you're striving for.

Always do your best. Your best is going to change from moment to moment; it will be different when you are healthy as opposed to sick. Under any circumstance, simply do your best, and you will avoid self-judgment, self-abuse and regret.
The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
Doing your best means never stop trying.
At his best, man is the noblest of all animals; separated from law and justice he is the worst.
The best hearts are ever the bravest.
My life motto is 'Do my best, so that I can't blame myself for anything.
The best people to have power are the ones who don't want it.
The best years of your life are the ones in which you decide your problems are your own.
The action is best that secures the greatest happiness for the greatest number.
